meanings.sent1: She potentiated the medicine by adding a special ingredient.
meanings.sent2: The new technology potentiated the capabilities of the device.
meanings.sent3: The magician potentiated his spell with a wave of his wand.
meanings.sent4: His determination potentiated his chances of success.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight potentiated the growth of the plants in the garden.

meanings.definition: To increase the effectiveness of something
meanings.sent1: Adding more fertilizer potentiated the growth of the crops.
meanings.sent2: The coach potentiated the team's performance with rigorous training.
meanings.sent3: The chef potentiated the flavor of the dish with a secret ingredient.
meanings.sent4: The motivational speech potentiated the students' enthusiasm for learning.
meanings.sent5: The storm potentiated the force of the waves crashing against the shore.
